CustomField.description: Rolling figure which is the average of the last 3 months of actual trade from the Grouped Account Revenue figure. It should be updated on a rolling monthly basis while the Opportunity is still in flight
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rolling figure which is the average of the last 3 months of actual trade from the Grouped Account Revenue figure. It should be updated on a rolling monthly basis while the Opportunity is still in flight
CustomField.label: 3 Month Average Actual
